Pre-Game Insights: Kane Williamson ruled out of the remainder of the series because of a hamstring injury
Tim Seifert is expected to replace Williamson in the playing XI
Miscellaneous Highlights: The contest will be played in Dunedin which has traditionally been batting friendly
Others: Pakistan are now fighting to keep the series alive after losing the first two contests
Another defeat will extend their wait for a first T20I series win since 2022
